title: 2 Bedroom 2 Full Baths w/Private Entrance & Full Size W&D!
map_address: 25900 Chelsea Park Dr near Beech Daly
posting_body: Welcome to Chelsea Park Apartments conveniently located just minutes from I-94 and I-275!
Our innovative 1,2 and 3 bedroom apartments provide you with contemporary and functional floor plans.
All of our apartment homes come with central air and heating, walk-in closets, updated kitchens with dishwashers and disposals, washer and dryer, patio or balcony with large picture windows.
Built with a commitment to exceptional quality and workmanship, Chelsea Park offers you a lifestyle of luxury that you can afford.
Visit our website for more information or you may simply APPLY ONLINE at <URL>
As a resident of our community, you get to enjoy the benefits of:
Pet-friendly
Heated Pool
Billiards
Fitness Center
Tennis Court
Equal Housing Opportunity Specials based on availability and may expire or change at any time.
Specials and discounts may not be combined.
Rates subject to change without advance notice.
